remarks: A version of ~ climinf using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
statement:
climinff.1 $e |- F/ k ph $.
climinff.2 $e |- F/_ k F $.
climinff.3 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
climinff.4 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
climinff.5 $e |- ( ph -> F : Z --> RR ) $.
climinff.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` ( k + 1 ) ) <_ ( F ` k ) ) $.
climinff.7 $e |- ( ph -> E. x e. RR A. k e. Z x <_ ( F ` k ) ) $.
climinff $p |- ( ph -> F ~~> sup ( ran F , RR , `' < ) ) $.
$d F x $.
$d Z k x $.
